title: Homemade Beef Stock
ingredients: ['2.7kg beef bones', '1 large onion', '3 large carrots', '125ml water', '2 sticks celery, including some leaves', '1 large tomato', '1 small parsnip, chopped', '1 small potato, chopped', '8 whole black peppercorns', '4 sprigs fresh parsley', '1 bay leaf', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 teaspoons dried thyme', '2 cloves garlic', '1.5 litres water']
